title: For reconstruction/redevelopment of existing authorized tenant- occupied buildings, which have been
clause_text: For reconstruction/redevelopment of existing authorized tenant- occupied buildings, which have been declared unsafe for human habitation by or are to be demolished for the same reason under a lawful order by the Municipal Corporation of Greater Mumbai and duly certified as such, undertaken by landlord/s or Co-operative Housing Societies of existing tenants, the permissible FSI prescribed under these regulations and Appendix below, shall be admissible as under: -
section: 33(6) Reconstruction of buildings destroyed by fire or which have collapsed or which have been demolished under lawful order
